source/include/boost/iterator/detail/minimum_category.hpp

00001 // Copyright David Abrahams 2003. Use, modification and distribution is

00003 // file LICENSE_1_0.txt or copy at http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)
00004 #ifndef MINIMUM_CATEGORY_DWA20031119_HPP
00005 # define MINIMUM_CATEGORY_DWA20031119_HPP
00006 
00007 # include <boost/type_traits/is_convertible.hpp>
00008 # include <boost/type_traits/is_same.hpp>
00009 
00010 # include <boost/mpl/aux_/lambda_support.hpp>
00011 
00012 namespace boost { namespace detail { 
00013 //
00014 // Returns the minimum category type or error_type
00015 // if T1 and T2 are unrelated.
00016 //
00017 // For compilers not supporting is_convertible this only
00018 // works with the new boost return and traversal category
00019 // types. The exact boost _types_ are required. No derived types
00020 // will work. 
00021 //
00022 //
00023 template <bool GreaterEqual, bool LessEqual>
00024 struct minimum_category_impl
00025 # if BOOST_WORKAROUND(BOOST_MSVC, == 1200)
00026 {
00027     typedef void type;
00028 }
00029 # endif 
00030 ;
00031 
00032 template <class T1, class T2>
00033 struct error_not_related_by_convertibility;
00034   
00035 template <>
00036 struct minimum_category_impl<true,false>
00037 {
00038     template <class T1, class T2> struct apply
00039     {
00040         typedef T2 type;
00041     };
00042 };
00043 
00044 template <>
00045 struct minimum_category_impl<false,true>
00046 {
00047     template <class T1, class T2> struct apply
00048     {
00049         typedef T1 type;
00050     };
00051 };
00052 
00053 template <>
00054 struct minimum_category_impl<true,true>
00055 {
00056     template <class T1, class T2> struct apply
00057     {
00058         BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT((is_same<T1,T2>::value));
00059         typedef T1 type;
00060     };
00061 };
00062 
00063 template <>
00064 struct minimum_category_impl<false,false>
00065 {
00066     template <class T1, class T2> struct apply
00067     : error_not_related_by_convertibility<T1,T2>
00068     {
00069     };
00070 };
00071 
00072 template <class T1 = mpl::_1, class T2 = mpl::_2>
00073 struct minimum_category
00074 {
00075     typedef minimum_category_impl< 
00076 # if BOOST_WORKAROUND(BOOST_MSVC, == 1200) // ETI workaround
00077         is_same<T2,int>::value ||
00078 # endif 
00079         ::boost::is_convertible<T1,T2>::value
00080       , ::boost::is_convertible<T2,T1>::value
00081 # if BOOST_WORKAROUND(BOOST_MSVC, == 1200) // ETI workaround
00082         || is_same<T1,int>::value
00083 # endif 
00084     > outer;
00085       
00086     typedef typename outer::template apply<T1,T2> inner;
00087     typedef typename inner::type type;
00088       
00089     BOOST_MPL_AUX_LAMBDA_SUPPORT(2,minimum_category,(T1,T2))
00090 };
00091     
00092 template <>
00093 struct minimum_category<mpl::_1,mpl::_2>
00094 {
00095     template <class T1, class T2>
00096     struct apply : minimum_category<T1,T2>
00097     {};
00098 };
00099     
00100 # if BOOST_WORKAROUND(BOOST_MSVC, == 1200) // ETI workaround
00101 template <>
00102 struct minimum_category<int,int>
00103 {
00104     typedef int type;
00105 };
00106 # endif
00107 
00108 }} // namespace boost::detail
00109 
00110 #endif // MINIMUM_CATEGORY_DWA20031119_HPP
